a.t-att-class: 'btn btn-cart text-uppercase text-center mb-2 text-white add_to_crt d-none' if product_variant.id in in_cart_lines.mapped('product_id').ids else 'btn btn-cart text-uppercase text-center mb-2 text-white add_to_crt'

div.t-att-class: 'css_quantity input-group input-group-sm mx-auto' if product_variant.id in in_cart_lines.mapped('product_id').ids else 'css_quantity input-group input-group-sm mx-auto d-none'

input.class: custom_js_quantity form-control quantity text-center bg-danger text-white h-auto
